title: Someone, Someone Got Amazing Snowdown Sales.
body:
http://leaguememe.com/uploads/league/2574215545.gif

Edit: Guys it was obvious after the DJ Sona it wasn't legit {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
Nice

Nice

Nice

Nice

Nice

Trolled -_-
Should have figured out as soon as DJ {{champion:37}} appeared. Didn't they say stuff like that WON'T appear in the snowdown shop? Anyways it was funny.

Yeah, they said no-no on Legendaries or better, pretty sure.

All of mine weren't even worth considering, sadly. They were with champs for which I already had the exact skin I wanted, or were simply skins I didn't want at all. Like, Freljord Rammus (already have Full Metal), Boneclaw Shyvana (have Darkflame and Ice Drake already), and some other stuff that was like, didn't quite hit the lottery on this one.
IMHO Boneclaw is by far the coolest in game, and I OWN every {{champion:102}}  skin.
i got a skin for my main (yorick) for like 60% off (aka about 200 rp)
Meanwhile, to me that's the worst skin she has by a wide margin (and also the one they offered me). She needs some new ones.
The splash up is str8 up ASS on boneclaw, the in game is amazing though.

Even in-game I think Boneclaw looks really crappy, in human form at least. I'll admit it has one of the best looking dragon forms, but since the majority of the game is spent in human, I dislike its appearance too much to ever use it.
My brother had battle boss blitz in his snowdown deals, so I think only ultimate skins don't appear.
Battle boss is a 1350, not legendary <3
At least you didn't get three Warwick skins.

I, uh...*scratches back of head* I don't own Warwick. I have a ton of champs I just spend IP on because I just have too much of it and feel like trying someone new out, but Warwick's never been one of them.
I got 3 graves skins, lol
Yeah RITO is shoving graves down my throat, even though i don't own him and have only played him free once or twice

At least you didn't get ugly pantheon: 
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/InjylixVNlo/maxresdefault.jpg

(Oh well I at least got: 
http://i.imgur.com/9otURYh.jpg on discount)
it was mostly becuase they would lose too much money with the lgendary snowball +snowdown shop you could poetentailly get 3 skins for the price of half regular price
They seemed to be the champions you played often, which makes sense, but also made it so you did end up seeing skins for champions you had skins for.
isnt dj sona and championship riven not allowed in snowdownshop?
That's part of the joke {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I got mahou shojo lux in mine xD

> [{quoted}](name=The Ellimiist,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Yi56OAPg,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-25T09:18:14.837+0000)
>
> I got mahou shojo lux in mine xD

....but it's referring to Sailor Moon, not Madoka Magica.

It actually takes multiple magical girls into account.

The recall and clothing style come from Sailor Moon, but the color scheme and hairstyle fit Madoka Magica. Her dance is from [DokiDoki! Pretty Cure](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R1z7c-_pqeA), and her staff takes after Cardcaptor Sakura.

Additionally, "mahou shoujo" doesn't only refer to Madoka Magica. It literally means "magic girl".

> [{quoted}](name=Sakuyahime,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Yi56OAPg,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-12-25T15:12:50.553+0000)
>
> It actually takes multiple magical girls into account.
> 
> The recall and clothing style come from Sailor Moon, but the color scheme and hairstyle fit Madoka Magica. Her dance is from [DokiDoki! Pretty Cure](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R1z7c-_pqeA), and her staff takes after Cardcaptor Sakura.
> 
> Additionally, "mahou shoujo" doesn't only refer to Madoka Magica. It literally means "magic girl".

...the worst part is I knew this beforehand, by brain just assumed "madoka magica'.


Still, great skin.
I'd ask how you know all of that, but I know. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

BITCH ITS SAYAKA OBVIOUSLY CAN'T YOU SEE THE SIMILARITIES?!?!?!
http://i.imgur.com/9otURYh.jpg?nodirect
http://i.imgur.com/PKgeW3q.jpg?nodirect
what animu is this from
madoka magica

Daymn, I gotta have a look at the rest of that stuff now - DLed it all (12 episodes, by what I learned from Google) earlier this year, but ran out of time...and brain memory (had a damaged chip), hence forgetting about it soon after.

[Meguca]Puella_Magi_Madoka_Magica[BD][h264-1080p_FLAC]
and
[tri4] Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magika (series and extras v2) [BD 1080p Hi10P FLAC]
for the extras.
The top one looks way more vicious...

Mahou Shoujo means "magical girl".

Star Guardian Lux is a reference to the magical girl genre as a whole... though it probably does lean more towards Sailor Moon than Madoka Magica.
Lunar Goddess Diana, Queen of Diamonds Syndra, Phoenix Quinn, Ice Drake Shyvana, and Crimson Akali

> [{quoted}](name=karma or feed,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Yi56OAPg,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-12-25T14:36:56.425+0000)
>
> Lunar Goddess Diana, Queen of Diamonds Syndra, Phoenix Quinn, Ice Drake Shyvana, and Crimson Akali

GIMME DAT LUNAR GODESS :'cccccc my luck isnt real. I just started hard maining diana like my last 60/80 games, and you get that Skin :'c

An ap assassin main that got a couple tank and adc skins. Rekt my life i want Diamond.

Dat luckster! _If only..._

I got:
Pool Party Lulu (-30%)
Elderwood Bard (-40%)
Bloodstone Lissandra (-40%)
Battle Bunny Riven (-50%)
Chosen Master Yi (-70%)
Dark Valkyrie Diana (-20%)

Would've been nice if not for already owning DT and WW Lulu, Snow Day Bard, Queen of Blades Lissandra, Redeemed Riven (which, as a lore nut, is her best skin), PROJECT Master Yi and Lunar Goddess Diana.

Oh well, can't be lucky all the time. Good thing I bought 2 buckets of patience when that was on sale, so I can easily wait for the ordinary sales.
I had hoped for PP Lulu, but for at least 50% off. As well as Urf The Nami-tee and Firecracker Jinx. But that was not to be.

Edit:
Oh, I snatched up Alien Invader Heimerdinger and Toy Soldier GP when I bought DT Tristana. 
+1 to my luck stat there. :D

http://lparchive.org/Breath-of-Fire-II/Update%2010/28-Breath_of_Fire_II_%28USA%29021.png

And Fnatic Karthus when buying Super Galaxy Rumble.
Also have my mouse hovering over Omega Squad Teemo and Dunkmaster (why do I always write "Duckmaster"?) Darius.

To do it? To not do it? That is the question. _Aaand the answer is ofc. 42._
Decisions, decisions.
I got three morde skins......
You say that like its a bad thing.
It wouldn't be, if I had more than two morde games on my account Xd
I only got one sale that was above 40%, and that was a 70% Elf Teemo... who even at full price is cheaper than all my other sale options. :(
I think, that only 520 and 750 rp skins were discounted by 70% :D
I got Cryocore Brand (975 rp) + champion (didn't own Brand) for 70% off.
Got Void Fizz (1350 RP) + Fizz (880 RP) for 70% off.

I want that skin T^T

I got imperial lux
You lucky piece of crap. :(
Yea right CS Riven and DJ Sona :D
it's a joke obviously {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
And that was sarcasm, obviously. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

It seems DJ Sona has been getting around.
Not bad for a low tier mystery skin gift :p
http://i.imgur.com/k3H5asM.png

Anyone would turn straight with that gift. xD
That is a nice random gift indeed.
or gay if you are a girl

Oh, that would make for great entertainment. Apply popcorn where appropriate. ^^

Aaanyway. You saw the name of the recipient in the screenshot above? That was what I was referring to.
I just had to clarify it, so as to not offend anyone. :)

But as for the dance of DJ Sona...someone at Riot clearly had his opinion on what is important in life.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EaNuuA6hJGQ
